verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

אֱמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor Say אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, throughout לְדֹרֹ֨תֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H1755><s%> le-do-Ro-tei-Chem among your generations כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any אִ֣ישׁ׀ <S%H376><s%> 'ish unto them Whosoever אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יִקְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> yik-Rav that goeth מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all זַרְעֲכֶ֗ם <S%H2233><s%> zar-'a-Chem, [he be] of all your seed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַקֳּדָשִׁים֙ <S%H6944><s%> hak-ko-da-Shim unto the holy things אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יַקְדִּ֤ישׁוּ <S%H6942><s%> yak-Di-shu hallow בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- which the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD וְטֻמְאָת֖וֹ <S%H2932><s%> ve-tum-'a-To having his uncleanness עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav; and וְנִכְרְתָ֞ה <S%H3772><s%> ve-nich-re-Tah shall be cut off הַנֶּ֧פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> han-Ne-fesh upon him that soul הַהִ֛וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv he מִלְּפָנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mil-le-fa-Nai from my presence אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. I [am] the LORD

אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish What man soever אִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish or a man מִזֶּ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> miz-Ze-ra' of the seed אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, of Aaron וְה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu who צָר֙וּעַ֙ <S%H6879><s%> tza-Ru-a' [is] a leper א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or זָ֔ב <S%H2100><s%> Zav, or hath a running issue בַּקֳּדָשִׁים֙ <S%H6944><s%> bak-ko-da-Shim of the holy things לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יֹאכַ֔ל <S%H398><s%> yo-Chal, he shall not eat עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher he יִטְהָ֑ר <S%H2891><s%> yit-Har; until he be clean וְהַנֹּגֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H5060><s%> ve-han-no-Ge-a' And whoso toucheth בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol anything טְמֵא־ <S%H2931><s%> te-me- any thing [that is] unclean נֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh, [by] the dead א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after תֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> te-Tze goeth מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu at שִׁכְבַת־ <S%H7902><s%> shich-vat- emission זָֽרַע׃ <S%H2233><s%> Za-ra'. of the descendants

וּבָ֥א <S%H935><s%> u-Va is down הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> hash-She-mesh And when the sun וְטָהֵ֑ר <S%H2891><s%> ve-ta-Her; he shall be clean וְאַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-Char and shall afterward יֹאכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> yo-Chal eat מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַקֳּדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6944><s%> hak-ko-da-Shim, of the holy things כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לַחְמ֖וֹ <S%H3899><s%> lach-Mo because it [is] his food הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he
